file.name: lib.yaml
file.content:
%YAML 1.2
---
openapi: 3.0.0

info:
  title: Library
  description: Collection of reusable standard definitions.
  version: 2.0.0
paths: {}
components:
  schemas:
    Error:
      type: object
      properties:
        error:
          type: string
          maxLength: 1
        error_description:
          type: string
          maxLength: 1
        status_code:
          type: string
        test:
          $ref: ./URIError.yaml#/components/schemas/Foo
